p: The spread of virus is very rapid, the mortality rate of COVID-19 is low compared to SARS and MERS. Currently, there is no curative therapy available, and the vaccines have not been developed. The main reason being the poorly understood pathology of COVID-19 and the differences across the geography besides the mutations in virus ( 4). The SARS-CoV-2 spreads mainly through respiratory droplets or droplet nuclei between individuals ( 5). Hence, social distancing and preventing the spread by respiratory droplets has become the mainstay of COVID-19 management rather than the drug treatment and vaccination ( 6).
